TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.IssuerNameRegistry

summary.span: 表示簽發者名稱登錄，其中會維護一份從應用程式組態檔中載入的信任簽發者清單，檔案中江美個簽發者的名稱與 X.509 憑證建立關聯性，驗證簽發者所產生之權杖簽署時需要此憑證。

span.span: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別維護所指的是該簽發者的名稱對應的每個受信任的簽發者憑證的受信任簽發者的字典。The class maintains a dictionary of trusted issuers by mapping the certificate of each trusted issuer to a name that refers to that issuer. 憑證會指定使用 ASN.1 編碼的憑證指紋的格式。The certificates are specified using the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint. 簽發者名稱可以是任何字串，只要它是唯一的應用程式範圍內。The issuer name can be any string, as long as it is unique within the scope of the application. 您可以透過此字典屬性。This dictionary can be accessed through the property. 類別只可以解析 X.509 憑證。The class can only resolve X.509 certificates. 受信任簽發者的對應由組態檔中加入項目底下[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)項目。The map of trusted issuers is specified in a configuration file by adding entries under the [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element. ``元素是子元素[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目和它時，有效類別中指定`type`該項目的屬性。The `` element is a child element of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element and it is valid when the class is specified in the `type` attribute of that element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱每個這些項目中的文件[WIF 組態結構描述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9)。For more information, see the documentation for each of these elements in the [WIF Configuration Schema](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4d4f6d76-49a5-4bad-b345-097b2e2844e9). 多個簽發者名稱登錄的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about issuer name registries, see the class. 您可以從衍生來實作您自己的組態根據的簽發者名稱登錄。You can derive from to implement your own configuration based issuer name registry. 您覆寫的方法將取決於您的實作。Which methods you override will depend upon your implementation. 例如，您可以覆寫方法來載入自訂組態結構描述的組態。For example, you can override the method to load configuration from a custom configuration schema. ## Examples 下列 XML 顯示組態加入集合的安全性權杖處理常式。The following XML shows configuration for a added for a collection of security token handlers. ``項目行為就像傳統的.NET 組態集合，允許``，``和``項目與子項目。The `` element behaves like a classic .NET configuration collection, allowing the ``, `` and `` elements as child elements. ``` ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddTrustedIssuer (string certificateThumbprint, string name);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddTrustedIssuer(string certificateThumbprint, string name) cil managed
Public Sub AddTrustedIssuer (certificateThumbprint As String, name As String)
public: void AddTrustedIssuer(System::String ^ certificateThumbprint, System::String ^ name);

param.name: certificateThumbprint
param.span: ASN.1 編碼形式的簽發者憑證指模。

span.span: ASN.1 encoded form of the issuer's certificate thumbprint.
The name of the issuer.

summary.span: 將簽發者加入至受信任簽發者的字典。

span.span: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以呼叫這個方法來加入至簽發者字典。You can call this method to add issuers to the dictionary. 在衍生類別中，您可以呼叫這個方法從方法，將簽發者加入至字典。In derived classes, you can call this method from the method to add issuers to the dictionary.

span.span: is or empty.
-or-
is or empty.

exception.span: 已經設定所指定的簽發者。

span.span: The issuer specified by has already been configured.
(The issuer already exists in the dictionary.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfiguredTrustedIssuers As IDictionary(Of String, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ ConfiguredTrustedIssuers { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得已針對執行個體設定之受信任簽發者的字典。

span.span: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.

value.span: 包含受信任簽發者的字典。

span.span: A dictionary that contains the trusted issuers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典的索引鍵是指紋的 ASN.1 編碼形式的受信任的簽發者憑證，而值是指紋的簽發者名稱。The key to the dictionary is the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint of the trusted issuer's certificate and the value is the issuer name. 字典包含在組態中所指定的簽發者和任何其他的簽發者已新增使用方法。The dictionary contains the issuers that were specified in configuration and any additional issuers that have been added with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetIssuerName(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken securityToken) cil managed

param.name: securityToken
param.span: 要為其要求發行者名稱的安全性權杖。

span.span: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.
Should be assignable as .

summary.span: 傳回與指定相關的簽發者名稱，方法是對應憑證指紋與信任簽發者字典中的名稱。

span.span: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.

returns.span: 如果字典中存在權杖憑證指紋的項目, 則為簽發者名稱；否則為 。

span.span: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the dictionary; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會搜尋字典中指定的 X.509 憑證的指紋`securityToken`。The default implementation searches the dictionary for the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate specified in `securityToken`. 如果找到項目，則會傳回簽發者名稱;否則，`null`會傳回。If an entry is found, the issuer name is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned. 如果`securityToken`不是依從，`null`會傳回。If `securityToken` is not assignable from , `null` is returned.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList customConfiguration) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (customConfiguration As XmlNodeList)

param.name: customConfiguration
param.span: 代表組態檔中所指定的受信任簽發者的對應的 XML。

span.span: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.

summary.span: 從組態載入信任的簽發者。

span.span: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定基礎結構會呼叫方法。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 呼叫這個方法時，`nodelist`會包含最上層子項目的[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)從組態檔的項目。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element from the configuration file. 每一種可能，接著，會包含屬性或子項目，根據您為您的衍生類別定義組態結構描述。Each of these may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 設定基礎結構會呼叫這個方法。This method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 預設實作會載入的組態[ <trustedIssuers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md)項目 (設定之下[ <issuerNameRegistry> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md)項目)。The default implementation loads configuration from a [<trustedIssuers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/trustedissuers.md) element (configured under the [<issuerNameRegistry>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry.md) element). 您可以覆寫這個方法，以提供您自己的自訂組態項目，在衍生類別中的支援。You can override this method to provide support for your own custom configuration elements in derived classes.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 組態包含一或多個無法辨識的項目。

span.span: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.
